profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!
name: Techno Kitchen Refacing

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed

profile:
From the year 1989 Brampton Kitchen & Cabinets Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing Custom Cabinetry, with Custom Kitchens being its flagship service. Brampton Kitchen follows a set of ethical values and professional procedures. We operate with the highest level of integrity and rigidly adhere to the policy of customer service, accountability and skill. We are a credible organization that stands behind its product. 
Extensive experience of several years and expertise of best artisans and craftsmen, we create designs that stand out. Be it your Kitchen, Bathroom, Vanity, Entertainment Unit, Bar or Walk-in Closet we have the skills to meet your every need. Our thorough knowledge of our trade is our biggest asset. We learn about your lifestyle while working alongside with you, so as to tailor your kitchen or cabinetry according to your specifications. From Planning to Designing to Manufacturing, we make sure you love every step along the way. We educate you about the industry, current trends and styles so that you make an informed decision.  We can turn your dream into reality without having to compromise on budget or quality.

profile:
Sinco granite is Toronto's leading granite countertop fabricator. We are a family run / operated business whose main goal is to keep 100% of our customers satisfied. 
Sinco is one of the largest granite countertop fabricator in Toronto with over 10,000 square foot facility. We are sure you will find something at our shop once you drop in. We have hundreds of slabs in stock at all times which can be viewed by our clients. We will be more than happy to personally assist every client and answer any questions they might have. 
Your referral is our best compliment. With our state of the art equipment, we ensure all our customers will be completely satisfied with our services and quality of craftsmanship. Give us a shot at your residential or commercial project, we are sure you will come back for more!

profile:
Marble Granite Countertops Inc. (MGC Inc.) has the capabilities to meet your aesthetic and design needs. Our assets lie in more than 15 years of experience and skills which our staff brings to the table, resulting in a high quality product delivered on time. We work with designers, architects and home builders to accommodate residential and commercial applications. We also specialize in working with a variety of stones such as Granite, Marble, Limestone, Quartz, Slate and more.
 
Our fabrication facility has all the tools and equipment required to guarantee a product of excellent quality and during fabrication quality control measures are in place to ensure that anything that leaves our facility has been thoroughly reviewed by a full time on-site supervisor. Whether your project is a kitchen counter-top, vanity, tub surrounding, fire place, or custom piece, our goal is to ensure 100% satisfaction on any finished product.

profile:
Upgrade Countertop & Stone supplies and installs custom cut quartz, granite, marble and all other natural stone counters .
 
All our workers have more then 10 years nature stone fabrication experience. We co-work with lots of stone suppliers such as Caesarstone, Silestone, Samsung, Hanstone, Interstone, etc in Toronto.We are fully licensed and insured and will provide you with a written contract, so there's no surprises!

We do both commercial and residential countertop projects.

Contact or Visit our factory at 271 Amber St, Unit 8 in Markham, ON to get professional suggestion.

Send your drawing to us or call us at 905-513-0868 to get the free quotation.

When we start the project, we will go and template your counter again. This process will last 45min-1hour.

After template and slab arrives, we need 4-5 business days fabrication. Guaranteed!! 

Installation will take 3-4 hours. It depends on the size of your project.

We also provide old countertop removal and disposal service. If you need us to do this , please let us know before installation.

profile:
Sinterstone Canada offers a wide variety of high end porcelain slabs (known as sintered stone worldwide). Our showroom is the largest in the GTA and our product is of the highest quality, for a great price. We offer fabrication as well as installation. 

This material is known for being very hard to damage, it is non-toxic, and it has the look/feel of natural stone such as marble for a fraction of the price. Zero maintenance and very long lasting.

profile:
At TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc., our client-centric approach focuses on creating the best customer experience on every project. Whether it is designing a new walkway to guide the path home or cleaning up an area of the backyard that lacks flow, our team is dedicated to providing excellent craftsmanship to reinvigorate even the most complex spaces. Our construction keeps longevity in mind, as clients continue to feel satisfied with project outcomes well into the future.

While TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc. is fairly new, our passionate, organized and hardworking team brings over 10 years of experience to the table. Needless to say, we are motivated to ensure that each client is 100% satisfied. If you can dream it, we can elaborate on the vision through innovative design ideas that translate a simple idea to a stunning reality. 

Explore our professional drone footage and navigate through our reviews to see for yourself.

profile:
Established in 2015, we are a fast growing, full service, detail-oriented custom cabinetry company trusted by customers in the Greater Toronto Area.

Fantasy Kitchen specializes in offering top-quality custom kitchen cabinets in Markham. We are passionate about enhancing the beauty and functionality of your home. As the most trusted cabinet manufacturer in GTA, we craft and install custom bathroom vanities in Richmond Hill.

Our goal is to exceed your expectations on every project, regardless of size. We have a team of skilled craftsmen for designing and installing custom wall units in Markham. Whether you need custom kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanity, walk-in closet, or home bar, we can customize cabinetry to suit your taste, style, and budget. Our team can also install custom wall units in Richmond Hill homes and commercial spaces. As a full-service cabinetry installer, we can make your home more stylish, comfortable, and spacious.

When it comes to kitchen cabinets and bathroom vanities, you need products that can withstand temperature fluctuations due to heat from stoves and ovens and moisture from showers, sinks, and dishwashers.

We focus on using the highest quality material and durable fixtures that can stand the test of time. Our process involves taking accurate measurements and understanding your vision to deliver tailored solutions. When we install custom bathroom vanities in Vaughan, we make sure to provide you a product that complements the size and style of your space.

We strive to turn your bathroom into a sanctuary. When we work on any project, our designers consider aesthetics, as well as functionality. Our experts will not only help you choose the right cabinetry material but can also guide you to select the best hardware and finishes that look phenomenal and can stand up to the challenges of a bathroom or kitchen environment. Our services include:

• Kitchen & Bathroom Design Consultation
• Custom Cabinets Manufacturer
• Kitchen Cabinetry Installation
• Bathroom Vanity Installation
• Walk-In Closet Installation
• Home Bar & Pantry
• And More!

At Fantasy Kitchen, we take great pride in our workmanship. From crafting custom Kitchen cabinets in Markham to installing bathroom vanities in Richmond Hill, we provide a wide range of superior quality products and spectacular installation services for almost every budget and style. We always respect your time and consider your ideas to ensure that the project is completed as per your requirements and expectations. We provide you the freedom to choose from our wide assortment of premium materials. In addition to this, we always provide accurate project quote to keep you informed. The cabinets we install provide a great storage solution to provide you an organized and attractive-looking space.
name: Fantasy Kitchens

profile:
Ayers Stone Inc is a trusted fabricator and installer of natural and engineered stone in Richmond Hill, Canada. We have been continuing delivering our customers products in high quality and best service they deserve! Offering delivery and installation to cities in GTA area and long-distance if required. Dedicated on meeting customers’ needs and give professional suggestions on kitchen countertop design, material selection and coordination. We're a 1 stop service for free measurement, design, fabrication, installation and warranty.

Working closely with the most professional stone and sink suppliers in GTA, we give our customers access to the best and latest global products with competitive price for kitchen counter tops, tub surroundings, vanity tops, tabletops, fireplace surroundings, floors and other accessories.

Hours: Monday--Saturday 9:30 am-6:00 pm (Book by appointment)
We are located at: 20 Wertheim Ct, Unit 16, Richmond Hill, ON L4B 3A

Tel: 647-804-7388 
Email: info@ayersstone.com

profile:
EK Marble and Granite Corp is a family business with over 20 years of experience specializing in custom marble, granite and quartz projects. 

Here at EK Marble and Granite Corp, we work together with customers to ensure that their creative needs are met when starting a new project. We offer a wide selection of the highest quality stone designs and patterns at affordable prices. And with our state of the art machinery, we will create one of a kind, unique, luxurious pieces for your residential or commercial property. 

Our services include the custom fabrication and installation of: kitchen countertops, backsplash, island countertop, bathroom vanity countertops, custom stone fireplaces, custom stone showers, and more! We service residential and commercial properties in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), Barrie, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, and Peterborough. Please note we do not service Downtown, Toronto.

Turn your dream project into a reality now! Contact us today for a FREE quote! 

Find us on Instagram: @ekmarble

profile:
On time, on budget, exceeding expectations – is our motto. Topss Inc. is proud to offer over 10 years of industry excellence and 100% customer satisfaction.

You want a marble and granite company that can complete your project fast, efficiently and within budget. Topss Inc. is that professional marble and granite stone company. Once you experience the difference that Topss offers with every service in their repertoire, you will know why Topss is one of the most trusted and called upon marble and granite companies in the Toronto area. Our relationship with you is the most important part of our business and we want you to feel welcome and at home the moment you walk into our doors. Our staff is friendly, professional and you may think that some of them can read your mind, because they listen and then act according to your wishes.
services: Custom solid surfaces best describes the product and service that we offer. Fabrication, installation, Restoration and Design Creation of everything from kitchen countertops to floors and fireplaces.
